name: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)
title: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)
description: This dataset is produced using 'A4. Ind Production 1270-1870' sheet in BoE dataset. For each variables, output figures are indexed those in year 1700 (i.e. 1700 = 100), and they are measured on a log scale.

sources.name: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: Broadberry, S., Campbell, B. M., Klein, A., Overton, M., & Van Leeuwen, B. (2015). British economic growth, 1270–1870. Cambridge University Press.
sources.additionalInfo: This dataset is produced using 'A4. Ind Production 1270-1870' sheet in BoE dataset. For each variables, output figures are indexed those in year 1700 (i.e. 1700 = 100), and they are measured on a log scale.

resources.path: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017).csv

fields.name: Tin
fields.description: Total output of tin, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much tin was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Iron
fields.description: Total output of iron, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much iron was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Coal
fields.description: Total output of coal, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much coal was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Wool/Textiles
fields.description: Total output of wool/textiles, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much wool/textiles was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Leather
fields.description: Total output of leather, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much leather was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Foodstuffs
fields.description: Total output of foodstuffs, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much foodstuffs was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Construction
fields.description: Total construction output, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much construction was done relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.

fields.name: Printed books
fields.description: Total output of printed books, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how many books were printed relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.
